title: WTB: Ty Cobb T206 Grades PSA/SGC 1-1.5

posts.post_title: WTB: Ty Cobb T206 Grades PSA/SGC 1-1.5
posts.post_content:
Hello,

Looking to purchase a Cobb in PSA 1-1.5 condition.  Preferably, the red, green, or bat off versions.

Thanks!
Look at the post below yours!

Thanks Scott

Yes, I have a Cobb Red for sale, SGC1 listed in the post right under this one here on the BST

I’m motivated to move this guy, feel free to make me an offer

Cheers,
Colton
Ty has been attained!  Thanks everyone!
